title: Revolutionize your Business with Content and Metadata Stores
abstract: This session will outline a compelling new architecture for managing content and data services at an enterprise level for both business and technical stakeholders to align their strategies on. In most enterprises there are a collection of systems, both legacy and new, which own and manage different workflows, content and data services. Often they do not work well together and are difficult to integrate at a technical and business level. How do you manage the differences between these systems and regain a simple enterprise view? This session will describe the role of MarkLogic and other technologies in building a powerful architectural approach to using Structured and Unstructured Content Stores, Metadata and Semantic Technology.

surveys.comments: A hugely entertaining and informative presentation - thanks John!
